import React from "react"; import "../../../Styles/Pages/Games/GamesRightCard.scss"; import apple from "../../../Assets/svg/apple.svg"; import lastPrice from "../../../Assets/svg/lastPrice.svg"; function GamesRightCard({ bgImg, displayActions, action, secondDevice, price, displayLastP, buttonName, title, }) { return ( <>
